roleset.name: to use or follow as a model

example.name: passive
example.text: The appeals court held : `` When a distinctive voice of a professional singer is widely known [*-3] and is deliberately imitated in order [*] to sell a product [*T*-2] , the sellers have appropriated what [*T*-1] is not theirs . ''
example.arg: a distinctive voice of a professional singer
in order [*] to sell a product

example.name: transitive
example.text: Peter Laird , a Los Angeles lawyer for Ms. Midler , said , `` We believe that the verdict reaffirms her position [*RNR*-1] and our position [*RNR*-1] that advertisers and advertising agencies can not with impunity imitate the voices of well-known performers .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'imitate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
